briefdescription.para: This function is used to clear dma interrupt flag.

parameterdescription.para: Flags setted to TLS_DMA_IRQ_BURST_DONE, TLS_DMA_IRQ_TRANSFER_DONE, TLS_DMA_IRQ_BOTH_DONE.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned char ch, void(*callback)(void *p), void *arg, unsigned char flags)
memberdef.name: tls_dma_irq_register

briefdescription.para: This function is used to register dma interrupt callback function.

parameterdescription.para: is the dma interrupt call back function.
the param of the callback function.
Flags setted to TLS_DMA_IRQ_BURST_DONE, TLS_DMA_IRQ_TRANSFER_DONE, TLS_DMA_IRQ_BOTH_DONE.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to register dma interrupt.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to Wait until DMA operation completes.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to To stop current DMA channel transfer.

simplesect.para: If channel stop, DMA_CHNL_CTRL_CHNL_ON bit in DMA_CHNLCTRL_REG is cleared.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to Request a free dma channel. If ch is 0, the function will select a random free channel, else return the selected channel no. if free.

simplesect.para: Channel no. that is free now
Channel no. that is free now
